website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable and elegant armchair that will match with any color palette.
pros: Comfortable with high back to support your head and neck
cons: Some complain that assembly is time-consuming and tedious

customer_reviews.title: Great, Sturdy Chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these for my man cave. I'm a big guy, 6'7" and about 280 and they are super comfortable and sturdy. I was initially concerned, because they are like accent chairs, many of which are small. But I can sit my wide rear end in the seat with room on either side and the curved arm rests are really comfortable. The chair comes in 4 pieces, 5 if you count the cushion, and was pretty easy to assemble with 10 allen bolts. The interior frame is made from particle board and plywood and feels super solid. Would definitely buy again. My wife wants another pair for the living room.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marquis

customer_reviews.title: A very good looking "extra" chair for the money
customer_reviews.text: A very good looking "extra" chair for the money. Main seat cushion is a bit too firm for my liking at 200#. All the parts came with it. If you don't mind assembly you save money over a furniture store as chairs are expensive these days. Assembly was a neck-tweaking affair for me and required some patience (a sweaty workout on a hot day for sure). A power screwdriver speeds it along, but I felt the need to use a few different drivers where space did not allow the power screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: P. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well constructed
customer_reviews.text: These look and feel like high quality chairs. They are heavy and have a solid feel. Initially the cushions feel a little firm but after 3-4 weeks of use the soften up and are very comfortable. I bought two chairs in coffee fabric. It took me 45 minutes to assemble the first one and 15 minutes to assemble the second after figuring out a few tricks (provided instructions to not illustrate the most efficient method of assembly). Overall, I am over satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M Paschall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is fantastic. I ordered 2 of them to complete our living room and they are perfect. Despite what other reviews have said about difficulty of install, it was better than expected. As a word of advice, do not tighten the screws until the very end. This will allow you the wiggle room to get all of the screws in their place. You can tell just by sitting in the chairs that they are high quality. It would be impossible to beat the price and we couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Vancil

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair for the price. It is wider than most chairs and deeper too. I am 5'10" and it's more comfortable for me with a pillow behind my back. Perfect chair for our den. Not too difficult to put together, although some of the holes didn't line up all the way and required a drill. Yet, it was an easy fix. The color is lighter than in the picture, but perfect for my space.
customer_reviews.author: Annliz

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair so far
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! Can not beat it for the price. Chairs were hard at first to me but they were not really purchased to be sat in only if we had extra company. They sit in front of my fireplace and face the main couch. I find myself sitting in them all the time to chat with my hubby and drink some coffee. Great Chair so far.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Anne Kotson

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Chair!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair! The cushions are firm enough to provide the needed support for people with back pain. I was leary about buying a chair online without being able to try it out, but other customer reviews convinced me that it had the firmness I need. They were absolutely right. This chair is more comfortable than any chair I've ever bought! The assembly was super-easy. I was nervous because some of the reviews made it sound difficult, but it wasn't. There were eight screws that went into metal threaded holes. Everything lined up and I was able to screw them in by hand right up until the end where I used the allen wrench to snug them up
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 chairs, based on other reviews (thank you!) Very pleased. About 45 min each to assemble, could have been faster except some of the bolts to be tightened with the included allen wrench were positioned so that you couldn't just "spin" the wrench, you know, get almost half a turn, line up the tool again for another half or quarter turn...However, not brain surgery at all, just a bit tedious.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Bittinger

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs
customer_reviews.text: We bought these chairs to put in our bedroom. My wife looked everywhere for chairs for this purpose. I found them on Amazon and we decide to order them and are very happy. The price was great and they look like much more expensive chairs that we looked at. They were not hard to assemble but it does take two people to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Flowers

customer_reviews.title: This is a very attractive and comfortable chair. The fabric is neutral and high quality ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive and comfortable chair. The fabric is neutral and high quality allowing this chair to complement any room. It only gets 4 stars because I found it difficult to put together, though another reviewer offered helpful hints. I'm just challenged in this way.
customer_reviews.author: holly salemi

customer_reviews.title: I am frustrated when I hoped to be very happy.
customer_reviews.text: The chairs arrived later than they said they would. They are lighter than it shows in the picture. The bolts to put it together were rather difficult. The chairs themselves may be OK, but with the late delivery, and difficulty with construdtion, I am frustrated when I hoped to be very happy.
customer_reviews.author: G'ma  R

customer_reviews.title: Love these chairs
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs! I call them my "thrones"! So roomy & luxurious. Four hands were helpful in the assembly. I bought two in the coffee shade, pairing them with two chocolate colored loveseats and ottomans that I found made with the same pet fur repelling material. Love the look & feel.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Parente

customer_reviews.title: The chair is well built and comfortable. The color is a little lighter than pictured ...
customer_reviews.text: the chair came 5 days before schedule. The chair is well built and comfortable. The color is a little lighter than pictured which is what I was counting on. The cats have scratched the corners without even tearing it. Love the chair.
customer_reviews.author: CVanDyke

customer_reviews.title: nice chair
customer_reviews.text: The picture color may not be accurate depending on your computer screen, for me the color is a little bit lighter than the Amazon photo but darker than what Emily posted. I did however use Emily's photo as my reason for purchasing. Overall I am happy with the purchase, once assembled this is a nice sturdy chair, but I do recommend Scotch Guard for stain protection. I assembled this alone and it was a bear, took me about an hour. I recommend two people assemble, it will go faster. For the price I think I could have found something else, I think this chair is overpriced. Nice, but overpriced, especially since you still have to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: allovertheplace

customer_reviews.title: Very nice chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair is very nice and comfortable. It was too large for designated area in my living room, so I had to return. I, however, would recommend this chair for purchase. In the photo the color looks to have a gray undertone, but is more of a beige.
customer_reviews.author: KLEshop

customer_reviews.title: these are super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I put these chairs together myself. With average DIY skills, these are super easy to put together. These chairs are lighter than the stock picture, but are a beautiful soft warm beige/gray color. They go perfectly with my dark brown leather sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. It's in the window and great for reading. I was a little worried, I'd never bought furniture that I can sit on over the internet before, but this is super comfy.
customer_reviews.author: A-bomb

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase for sight unseen!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in spite of snowstorm! Two Chairs ordered, definitely less "green" in appearance, more of a stone/taupe in color, microfiber. Very simple to assemble, no parts missing, used a wratchet/screwdriver instead of the supplied allen tool. Very sturdy, heavy, and attractive. Large enough to sit straight or w/ legs up, super comfortable and cozy once they are broken in (I'm sure!). Would definitely recommend to friends : )
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair was even better than expected. It's very comfortable. It was put together by my 15 yr. old grandson, which we were both very proud of.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this chair, so much so that I bought a 2nd one. It was fairly easy to put together, the fabric is very nice, and the chair is quite comfortable and sturdy. It looks just as shown in the picture. The 2 chairs look great in my living room and it's a very good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JDinCincy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chairs, much lighter than coffee
customer_reviews.text: I do love these chairs. The name of the color and the picture is misleading. They are more the color of coffee creamer - much lighter than the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. It's so soft and super comfortable. Easy to put together and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great chair for the price. Color is lighter than picture portrayed. Little odd angles putting it together. Overall it is a good purchase. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: alyson mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: A substantial chair at a good price ...
customer_reviews.text: The shipping and arrival were quicker than expected. The chair does suggest quality and looks like it will last. As others noted, it's a bit tricky to assemble because of the small access area to tighten the hardware. The only annoyance for me is a loud squeak (like a spring!?) that arrived after the first week. It happens when you lean against the back cushion. I'm hoping it will just as magically depart ... not looking forward to a tear down and re-assembly to see if that's the cure. Otherwise, I do like the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T

customer_reviews.title: chair
customer_reviews.text: have not yet put the chair together, but it looks like it will be easy to do. Love the color and fabric, the chair came in a short time after ordering it. I would recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Ronald G. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Chair
customer_reviews.text: I really love my chair and so does everybody else visiting me. The color and fabric are just right for any room. It is so comfortable and relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy J Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, large chair that I fit comfortably in. I am 6'6, 235. My neigbor put it together in 10 minutes and he is a craftsman and said the quality is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Honmike

customer_reviews.title: Great chair - Great price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy - easy to assemble. The color is not green like in the picture, the chair is actually a medium beige tone. It's a great chair for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Helske

customer_reviews.title: Super fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the chair on a Friday - received it the following Tuesday! Chair was a little hard for one person to put together but all in all I am super please with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: kodiak

customer_reviews.title: The chair is advertised as taupe, but the picture ...
customer_reviews.text: The chair is advertised as taupe, but the picture shows the chair is brown or olive green. When I got the chair, I saw the color and sent it back. The color is actually a light taupe.
customer_reviews.author: RLW1984

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chairs at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Chair is very comfortable. Color is light beige. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice look, nice chair, good quality
customer_reviews.text: The chair is comfortable and has a nice retro-modern look. The fabric and construction seem to be of very good quality at this price. Putting it together is not hard but takes a little maneuvering - basically just putting in eight screws, but a couple of them you have to reach inside the zippered innards to get them in and getting all the holes lined up would be easier with two people (although I did it on my own). Note that while the chair is a good width for a smaller space, it is 'deeper' than it looks; it sticks out into the room a lot more than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Ravinia

customer_reviews.title: The wrong color was delivered and it is a poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: The wrong color was delivered and it is a poor quality product. I would not buy from this manufacturer in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Frost

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is very elegant looking and it is pretty comfortable..for the price I paid I can't complain... I've sat in expensive chairs that aren't comfortable at all! Based on the home photo review that I read, I thought the chair leaned more gray which I was ok with, however, in person it looks more like a coffee w/cream to me (very similar to the company's picture.) It took me about 45 mins to put together. Now all I need is an ottoman to go with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Affordable Chair - It's Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful chair!!! I got the light colored one. It's a bit bigger than I expected, but that's a plus. A bit stiff because new, but still comfy. Super easy to put together (15 minutes max) and quality is excellent!! Price for quality is great. I hunted and hunted for a bedroom chair and am so glad to have found this at such an excellent price for such a great quality chair. Buy one, or a set. You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri S

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Chair
customer_reviews.text: Love the chair ,very heavy and sturdy . The side panels at the top don't seem to connect very well but overall ,well made chair ,color was more of a mushroom or very light coffee
customer_reviews.author: Grover

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair, but color isn't as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chair and easy assembly. Ordered the coffee color, but it really looks like a light beige or tan which is quite disappointing as the color pictured would've looked great in my livingroom. Bought for $269 which was the best price I could find after an exhaustive search.
customer_reviews.author: Clio

customer_reviews.title: great chair!
customer_reviews.text: This chair was exactly what I wanted. The color and size are perfect. It is neutral and not too big, but still comfortable. I was able to assemble it myself in about 30 minutes. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

product_meta.title: AVE SIX Curves Tufted Back Armchair with Espresso Finish Solid Wood Legs, Coffee Velvet Fabric
product_meta.description: Curves tufted back armchair with coffee velvet easy-care fabric and solid wood espresso finish legs. Available in chocolate brown and coffee brown. Upholstered in 100% polyester velvet fabric over a solid wood frame. Espresso finished legs.
feature_bullets: Available in Chocolate brown and Coffee brown

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars46 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
